### A Little About Our Data

The data from this project was collected from the [The Squirrel Census](https://www.thesquirrelcensus.com/), ran by the Department of Data - NYC, and available for download at [NYC OpenData](https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Environment/2018-Central-Park-Squirrel-Census-Squirrel-Data/vfnx-vebw).
